mapper.select: SELECT a.* , b.product_cate_type , b.product_cate_large , b.product_cate_medium , b.product_cate_small FROM product_tb a INNER JOIN product_cate_tb b ON (a.product_cate_no = b.product_cate_no AND a.product_no= #{productNo})

SELECT c.product_img_no , c.product_img_file_name , c.product_img_type FROM product_tb a INNER JOIN product_img_tb c ON (a.product_no = c.product_no AND c.product_img_del_fl = 'N') WHERE a.product_no = #{productNo}

SELECT a.*, b.store_name FROM product_comment_tb a INNER JOIN user_tb b ON a.product_comment_writer = b.user_no WHERE a.product_no = #{productNo} AND a.product_comment_del_fl = 'N' ORDER BY a.product_comment_reg_dt desc

SELECT p.product_seller, u.store_no, u.store_name, sr.store_review_cnt, nvl(i.store_img_no, -1) store_img_no, p.store_product_cnt FROM (SELECT product_seller, count(1) AS store_product_cnt FROM product_tb WHERE product_disp_st NOT IN ('D', 'P') GROUP BY product_seller) p INNER JOIN user_tb u ON p.product_seller = u.user_no AND p.product_seller = #{productSeller} LEFT JOIN store_img_tb i ON i.store_no = u.store_no LEFT JOIN (SELECT store_no, count(1) AS store_review_cnt FROM store_review_tb GROUP BY store_no) sr ON sr.store_no = u.store_no

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum , pd.*, img.product_img_no FROM product_tb pd INNER JOIN (SELECT product_no, min(product_img_no) AS product_img_no FROM product_img_tb GROUP BY product_no) img ON pd.product_no = img.product_no AND pd.product_seller = #{productSeller} WHERE pd.product_disp_st not IN ('D', 'P') ORDER BY img.product_no ) a
WHERE rnum < 3

SELECT a.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum , s.store_no, nvl(u.store_img_no, -1) store_img_no, u.store_name, s.store_review_rating , s.store_review_content , s.store_review_reg_dt FROM store_review_tb s INNER JOIN user_tb u ON s.store_no = u.store_no AND s.store_no = #{productSeller} ) a WHERE rnum < 3
